titleStmt.title: Sacellum Apollinaire a funeral poem to the memory of that great patriot & statesman, George, late Marquis of Hallifax.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Wilkins, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Settle by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
